Tile Class Reference

void processImageChunk (uint y, image_t chunk)
 Processes a chunk.

Detailed Description

An object representing a tile in the image. Can either contain its raw image data, or, when the tile is not atomic (tiles are atomic when their size is 1), four subtiles.

Whenever all four subtiles are complete and stored on disk as JPEG's, they are combined and scaled to one new tile (of the same physical size). The raw data of the component tiles is then immediately deallocated, greatly reducing the amount of memory necessary.
